articles.title: Japan’s Nikkei 225 breaches key 40,000 level for first time - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The blue-chip gauge rose as much as 1% to 40,301.30 on Monday, a fresh intraday record. Tech shares, which have helped push shares higher over the past year, were leading the way, with Advantest Corp. among the top performers.
articles.content:
Japans Nikkei 225 Stock Average climbed above the psychological level of 40,000 for the first time, opening the door to further gains in its historic rally.
